execution_quality: The agent provided no response to the initial request and did not engage with the follow-up questions, resulting in incomplete consultation.
work_category: Conversational design consultation where user sought feedback on extensibility patterns for system design, then pivoted to personal assessment questions.
summary: The agent failed to engage with the user's initial request for design feedback or respond to subsequent follow-up questions about training and interview performance. No work, tools, or communication was produced despite clear conversational prompts from the user.
follow_up_pattern: User asked a direct follow-up question about training data and personal performance assessment, expecting conversational engagement.
